titleStmt.title: Intimation by the town-clerk of Edinburgh, to the whole burgesses of the said burgh, concerning the election of their commissioners to the meeting of the estates of this kingdom, which is to be holden the 14th day of March 1689 years.
titleStmt.author: Edinburgh (Scotland). Town Council.

titleStmt.title: Intimation by the town-clerk of Edinburgh, to the whole burgesses of the said burgh, concerning the election of their commissioners to the meeting of the estates of this kingdom, which is to be holden the 14th day of March 1689 years.
titleStmt.author: Edinburgh (Scotland). Town Council.
Rocheid, Ja.
William, III, King of England, 1650-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Ja. Rocheid Cls.
In response to a letter of William of Orange, dated 5 Feb. 1688/9. This letter printed on verso.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
